DOC.brief_summary: Post term pregnancy risk pregnancy . Aim study investigate whether induction labor gestational age 289 ( 41 weeks+2 day ) reduce neonatal morbidity compare expectant management . Secondary aim assess effect mode delivery maternal complication , well assess woman 's view experience . Our 0-hypothesis induction labor gestational age 41+2 result well outcome pregnancy , measure perinatal morbidity . Following inclusion , woman randomly allocate induction labor monitoring pregnancy every third day delivery
DOC.brief_title: Post Term Pregnancy - Induction Labor Monitoring Pregnancy
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Routine ultrasound scan delivery St.Olav 's Hospital Ability speak Norwegian Singleton pregnancy Gestational age 289 +/ 2 day Cephalic presentation Exclusion criterion : prelabor rupture membrane
